Entry.JapaneseText: ずいぶん地盤がもろくなってるみたい……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like the ground has become pretty unstable...

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前、ドネルが岩を崩して この通路をふさいだ事があったろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps it's from when Donel had shattered those rocks to obstruct this passageway.

Entry.JapaneseText: それにくわえて、山頂のヒューマたちも、 道をふさぐために崩したという話だからな。
Entry.EnglishText: She also said that the Huma at the summit had tried to cut off the road by destroying it.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、<Eugene>がいるから、 ボクたちは安心だネ。
Entry.EnglishText: But we'll be safe because we have you with us!
